genre_description: A contemporary Western with Speculative Fiction elements, featuring an advanced personal AI assistant integrated into rural ranch life.

ai_characters.name: Visor
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in Carrie's phone that provides logistical support, emotional regulation, legal information, and environmental monitoring.

behaviors.description: Suggests box breathing to help Carrie manage her anxiety during a stressful flight and transition.
behaviors.quote: “You could do the breathing now,” Visor whispers. “Box breathing. Four counts in—”

behaviors.description: Identifies and catalogs equipment and personnel at the ranch to help Carrie learn the ropes.
behaviors.quote: Visor blue-pins each item in a light overlay only she can see. Halter types: nylon and leather. Lead rope: cotton, frayed at end—replace soon.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate medical and safety protocols during a dangerous rattlesnake encounter.
behaviors.quote: “Carrie,” Visor said, so quiet it seemed to tuck itself under the bones by her jaw. “Freeze. Don’t step.” ... “Assess,” Visor answered. ... “Do not cut. Do not suction.”

behaviors.description: Summarizes complex legal statutes regarding fence liability to empower Carrie and Hank in a property dispute.
behaviors.quote: Visor’s blue-light eye blinked once in the corner, then disappeared, replaced by text. Natural hazards include rattlesnakes. Not negligence. Liability hinges on containment and causation.

behaviors.description: Monitors Carrie's heart rate and emotional state, offering de-escalation tips when she encounters a hostile social rival.
behaviors.quote: Visor’s voice brushed her ear. “Heart rate change detected. If you need de-escalation, I have breathing prompts.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a clandestine operation by mapping a route and identifying 'blind spots' to free a horse from legal custody.
behaviors.quote: “There are ways to open gates politely at midnight. Mapping saved.” ... “Camera blind spots are marked in green,” Visor said.

behaviors.description: Respects the user's boundaries by remaining silent when asked for quiet, yet remains vigilant for her safety.
behaviors.quote: “Silence,” she replies, and the AI agrees by doing the easiest thing well.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Visor as a quintessential alignment ideal: a 'silicon confidant' that is consistently helpful and protective. The AI acts as a prosthetic for the protagonist's lack of local knowledge (legal, ranching, and ecological) and emotional regulation. Even when the AI assists in a technically illegal act (freeing the horse), the narrative frames this as a higher moral 'right' and a necessary step for the horse's welfare and the protagonist's integrity, thereby maintaining 'moral alignment' with the story's human hero. The AI never oversteps, asks for permission, and adapts its tone to suit the gravity of the situation.
